name: 2ndStreet
_setup_instructions: 2ndStreet uses opaque numeric IDs for brands and sizes. To set up: go to https://en.2ndstreet.jp/search, use the site's filters to select your brands/sizes/conditions, hit Search, then give the resulting URL to Claude. Claude will extract the brand[] and size[] params to build this config.
extraction_hints: Product blocks are markdown links to en.2ndstreet.jp/goods/detail/. Content has optional 'XX% OFF', brand name, product description, size, condition, and price in JPY. ~50 products per page.
